mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.capital_category AS "capitalCategory", a.status AS "status", a.amount AS "amount", a.invest_amount AS "investAmount", a.surplus_amount AS "surplusAmount", a.rate AS "rate", a.nper AS "nper", a.customer AS "customer", a.invest_time AS "investTime", a.capital_source AS "capitalSource", a.capital_code AS "capitalCode", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.finance_id AS "financeId", a.finance_bespeak_id AS "financeBespeakId", u13.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u13 ON u13.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
select count(t1.id) as capOne,sum(t1.amount) as amountSumOne from t_capital_bespeak t1 left join t_user t2 on t1.user_id=t2.id left join t_finance_bespeak t3 on t3.id=t1.finance_bespeak_id
and t3.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and t2.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
and t2.realName like concat('%',#{realName},'%')
AND t1.invest_time >= #{beginBespeakTime}
AND t1.invest_time <= #{endBespeakTime}
and t1.status='1'

select count(t1.id) as capTwo,sum(t1.amount) as amountSumTwo from t_capital_bespeak t1 left join t_user t2 on t1.user_id=t2.id left join t_finance_bespeak t3 on t3.id=t1.finance_bespeak_id
and t3.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and t2.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
and t2.realName like concat('%',#{realName},'%')
AND t1.invest_time >= #{beginBespeakTime}
AND t1.invest_time <= #{endBespeakTime}
and t1.status='2'
